content.value: Mystic House is a 3-minute walk from Centenario Park and 15 minutes from the historic center of Cartagena de Indias.
Free WiFi access is available in all areas.

All our rooms and bedrooms are with air conditioning and private bathroom (no heater).
There is no shared kitchen, but you can help what you need eg dishes, knives, glasses heat water.

Mystic House Hostal has a 24-hour reception, a terrace and a shared lounge as well as a tourist information point. This property is 550 meters from Cartagena Convention Center and 15 minutes by car from Rafael Núñez International Airport.

In Mystic House you will found all kinds of tourist services within the city, trips to the Islands, City tous, Chivas Parranderas, Totumo Volcano, Tickets Bus Sale, Travel to Panama by Boat, Extreme Sports and More.
Mystic House Hostal is located 3 minutes’ walk from the Centenario Park and 1.5 km from Cartagena de Indias Historic Centre. Free WiFi access is available in all areas.
Each room here will provide you with bed linens. They can be fitted with air conditioning or fans. The bathrooms are either private or shared and come with a shower.
At Mystic House Hostal you will find a 24-hour front desk and a terrace. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge and a tour desk.
This property is 550 m from Cartagena’s Convention Centre and 10 minutes’ drive from Cartagena’s Walled area. Rafael Núñez International Airport is 15 minutes’ drive away.
Getsemani is a great choice for travellers interested in nightlife, culture and architecture.

description.description:
Welcome to Mystic House!

hostel very well located in the Medialuna Street, inside the walled city of Cartagena de Indias. Our street is the place to be at nights if you want to party, so you can walk a little bit and you will find plenty of bars and discos, and then come back to relax and sleep in our place.
